column4: Yes it say Direct Connection to Internet but yet it still hangs on Connecting to www.google.com
OK just done sudo dhclient now wat?
no not on the same computer
what does ifconfig eth0 say, does it include an ip address?
also, are you connected via a router?
do websites not load at all or do you get an error message?
strange.. have you tried other sites?
that means that you have not got your dns settings right
there should be a couple of ip addresses in there
yes, excuse me.. there is no e there :)
